subject: Football
lead_paragraph: ARRELIOUS BENN The Illinois freshman, left, returned a kickoff 90 yards for a touchdown and caught a 29-yard pass for another score in the Illini’s 27-20 upset of No. 21 Penn State.
snippet: ARRELIOUS BENN The Illinois freshman, left, returned a kickoff 90 yards for a touchdown and caught a 29-yard pass for another score in the Illini’s 27-20 upset of No. 21 Penn State.
